title: League of Legends Fix
body: So, there is a problem with my lol launcher. I start normally and the i press the orange button "LAUNCH". After that there is nothing. I have tried several thing but anything helped. Every help hand is welcome. I will really apprecciate your efforts to help me. :)

replies.body: ctrl alt delete, go to processes and end all processes that have anything to do with league and try again. alternatively just restarting your pc should do the same.

MissLeBlanc definitely suggested a great first step. If you're still seeing problems, it's most likely due to incompatible network settings or a third-party program blocking League. I strongly recommend taking steps from [our Connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) that may resolve the issue for you.

Let me know if this helps.
